name: Super Match2 Blast
description:
Are you ready for an exciting blasting experience? Match cubes to pop them and get cool bombs and rockets to clear the board!

Play thousands of colorful levels for hours of fun!

So come join us for a blasting adventure and see how far you can go!

Fun features for you:
* Fun and addictive puzzle solving gameplay
* 2000+ unique puzzles
* Simple yet challenging game play. Match blocks and combine powerups
* Unlimited lives!
* Crazy boosters to help you blast away blocks
